name: No Milk
description:
This game was made during Texas A&M's 48-hour game jam, "Chillennium"!

Team Chill 'Em All consisted of Brandon Anderson, Ben Njus, Emma Hudroge, and Vivian Cavazos.

---CONTROLS---

Player 1 - WASD to move

Player 2 - Arrow keys to move

Press A & D to navigate any menus w/ space bar to select

DS4 controller support with X to select

Music by Kevin Macleod of incompetech.com.
